clinical_study.brief_title: Risk Prediction of Bleeding in Liver Cirrhosis by Combi-elastography
clinical_study.official_title: Risk Prediction of Bleeding in Liver Cirrhosis by Combi-elastography

brief_summary.textblock: Through the parameters of liver stiffness and spleen stiffness obtained by combi-elastography technique, summarize and analyze the warning index of esophagogastric variceal bleeding in patients with cirrhosis, so as to provide a new and valuable technique for clinical diagnosis.

detailed_description.textblock:
Firstly,the combi-elastography technique developed by HITACHI uses the method of multi-index and multi-parameter to evaluate the liver stiffness and spleen stiffness comprehensively.
And then,this prospective study is designed to follow up patients with cirrhosis for a period of 12 months, summarize and analyze the warning index of bleeding in patients with cirrhosis,so as to provide a new and valuable technique for clinical diagnosis.

primary_outcome.description: F index is linked to the degree of liver fibrosis,and it can be available by ultrasound elastography checking.
A index is linked to the degree of hepatitis ,and it can be available by ultrasound elastography checking.
Spleen stiffness can be available by ultrasound elastography checking.

study_pop.textblock: Patients with liver cirrhosis and the gastroscopy is in line with the indications of portal hypertension.
